msgSnippet: Download JUnit and read the documentation.  There are examples in there. ... From: mbcheluvaraj [mailto:mbcheluvaraj@yahoo.com] Sent: 19 July 2002 13:55 To:
messageBody:
Download JUnit and read the documentation. There are examples in there.

-----Original Message-----
From: mbcheluvaraj [mailto:mbcheluvaraj@...]
Sent: 19 July 2002 13:55
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Regarding Swing testing


Hai All !

i am new to this testing field and being a java developer i want
use Automated Testing for my Applications.please guide me what all
needed for this testing swing UI and how to write TestCases with
simples examples using GUI,GUI and Business logic, etc it will be
better to have one Full pledged Application which uses jfcunit
Automated testing .

Thanks in advance
Very Urgent

bye
Cheluva .
